column4: Hi, I just switched from arch linux and I KNOW ati propietary drivers worked TERRIIBLY with gnome3/cinnamon, but do they work with unity? as in no graphical quarks?
siavashserver; I've just moved up into the mountains with hardly any internet/time to maintain such an installation anymore, so ubuntu would be easier
was just wondering since they were always glitchy with gnome3/cinnamon
two friends of mine have ati gpu's and no problems at all
